animals.name: Whinnie the pooh
animals.about: A danger to anything with a pulse, the pooh bear is rumored to not only be capable of turning a semicolon into a period, but is more than capable of taking your honey as well.

animals.name: Derp Noodle
animals.about: Ask it any question and it shall provide an answer. Whether or not it's always correct is difficult to say.

animals.name: Cute Nope
animals.about: Look at those eyes... cute enough to almost say not nope too.

animals.name: Baby Snow Bear
animals.about: Looks like a marshmellow but is not eddible, but if you try to eat it mama snow bear will eat you.

animals.name: Water Noodle
animals.about: Danger noodles are already bad enough, the only thing that'd be worse than a water noodle is a flying one.

animals.name: Baby Noodle
animals.about: Often confused with the dirt noodle but is in fact a baby danger noodle.

animals.name: Italian Noodles
animals.about: These noodles aren't as dangerous as the other noodles if you don't consider what it could do to your cholestrol.

animals.name: Teddy
animals.about: A once inanimate Teddy Bear, which attained sentience after his owner/brother wished upon a star.

animals.name: Avenger Nope
animals.about: Despite it's deadly bite and small figure it's arch nemesis is either a boot or infinity stone

animals.name: Dragon Noodle
animals.about: An obvious descendant of dragons due to it's slit like pupils and scaled appearance

animals.name: N0P3
animals.about: Created by SkyNet the latest rendition of the 2-7t

animals.name: Theadore
animals.about: Has a warrant in all fifty states
